participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and hardworking, Alex has a passion for construction and a deep love for his cats, which bring him joy and comfort.
participant_1.background: i've 5cats. i am a construction worker. my cats are very special to me. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Resilient and energetic, Jordan thrives on challenges and is dedicated to helping others as a life coach while maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i'm a cancer survivor. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic.
